Class MessageBoxBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.project309.app.MessageBoxBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageBoxInter, MessageBoxListenerInter

    public class MessageBoxBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageBoxInter, MessageBoxListenerInter
    This class is used to display messages to the user in an interactive way
